cookie.title: Cookies
cookie.description: We are using analytics cookies in the website.

auth.warning: If you have already logged in before, please use the same provider.

confirmed.title: Your account is not confirmed
confirmed.description: Click on the verification link in your e-mail box

invalid.title: Login failed!
invalid.description: Email or password is not correct or the account doesn't exist

form.accept: I read and accept terms and conditions

email_taken.title: Email is already taken
email_taken.description: Please try logging in again with the same provider you did before

register_success.title: Email has been sent!
register_success.description: Click on the verification link in your e-mail box

session_error.title: Authentication Error!
session_error.description: Your session has expired. Please log in again.

login_error.title: Login Error!
login_error.description: Please try logging in again with the same provider you did before. You will be directed to the login page.

translation.apply_success: Your application has been successfully completed
translation.has_applied: You have made an application before.
